todo-list.name: To-Do List
todo-list.description: A simple PWA for managing tasks.
todo-list.html: To-Do List
todo-list.css: body { font-family: Arial; text-align: center; } ul { list-style-type: none; padding: 0; }
todo-list.js: function addTask() { const taskInput = document.getElementById('newTask'); if (taskInput.value) { const li = document.createElement('li'); li.textContent = taskInput.value; document.getElementById('tasks').appendChild(li); taskInput.value = ''; }}

weather-app.name: Weather App
weather-app.description: A simple PWA that fetches and displays weather data.

calculator.name: Calculator
calculator.css: body { font-family: Arial; text-align: center; } button { font-size: 20px; margin: 5px; padding: 10px; }
calculator.js: let display = document.getElementById('calcDisplay'); function calculate(value) { if (value === '=') { display.value = eval(display.value); } else { display.value += value; }} function clearCalc() { display.value = ''; }

note-app.name: Notes App
note-app.css: body { font-family: Arial; text-align: center; } textarea { width: 80%; height: 200px; }
note-app.js: function saveNote() { localStorage.setItem('note', document.getElementById('note').value); } window.onload = function() { document.getElementById('note').value = localStorage.getItem('note') || ''; };

stopwatch.name: Stopwatch
stopwatch.css: body { font-family: Arial; text-align: center; } button { margin: 5px; padding: 10px; font-size: 16px; }
stopwatch.js: let timer, seconds = 0, minutes = 0, hours = 0; function startTimer() { timer = setInterval(() => { seconds++; if (seconds == 60) { minutes++; seconds = 0; } if (minutes == 60) { hours++; minutes = 0; } document.getElementById('timer').textContent = `${hours.toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${minutes.toString().padStart(2, '0')}:${seconds.toString().padStart(2, '0')}`; }, 1000); } function stopTimer() { clearInterval(timer); } function resetTimer() { clearInterval(timer); seconds = 0; minutes = 0; hours = 0; document.getElementById('timer').textContent = '00:00:00'; }
